Package org.glassfish.jersey.jetty

package org.glassfish.jersey.jetty
Jersey Jetty container classes.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.glassfish.jersey
    Common Jersey core classes.
    org.glassfish.jersey.jetty.connector
    Jersey client connector based on the Jetty Client.
    org.glassfish.jersey.jetty.http2
    Jersey Jetty HTTP2 container classes.
    org.glassfish.jersey.jetty.internal
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    JettyHttpContainer
    Jersey Container implementation based on Jetty Handler.
    JettyHttpContainerFactory
    Factory for creating and starting Jetty server handlers.
    JettyHttpContainerProvider
    Container provider for containers based on Jetty Server Handler.
    JettyHttpServerProvider
    Server provider for servers based on Jetty Server.
